mapper.select: SELECT level , prjt_fdbk_no , prjt_no , pf.memb_id , prjt_fdbk_cntn , prjt_fdbk_dt , prjt_fdbk_upno , CONNECT_BY_ROOT prjt_fdbk_no AS root_no , memb_nm , prjt_fdbk_show FROM project_feedback pf LEFT JOIN member m ON(pf.memb_id = m.memb_id) WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} START WITH prjt_fdbk_upno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR prjt_fdbk_no = prjt_fdbk_upno
